```{r}
fit_all <- lm(
  formula = `Agriculture total|CO2` ~ . - Year,
  data = df_all_agriculture_nona %>% filter(as.integer(Year) <= 2017)
)
df_coeff <- fit_all %>% tidy() %>% arrange(desc(estimate)) %>% tail(-1) %>% filter(estimate > 0)
df_coeff
```

```{r}
df_cor <- cor(df_all_agriculture_nona, df_all_agriculture_nona %>% select(`Agriculture total|CO2`)) %>% data.frame() %>% rownames_to_column("Term") %>% rename(cor = Agriculture.total.CO2) %>% tail(-1)
df_cor
```

```{r}
df_cor %>% 
  mutate(
    Term = fct_reorder(Term, cor)
  ) %>% 
  arrange(desc(abs(cor))) %>% 
  head(30) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(
      x = cor,
      y = Term
    )) +
    geom_col()
```
```{r}
df_all_agriculture %>% 
  mutate(`Cherries, sour|Area harvested` = (`Cherries, sour|Area harvested` - min(`Cherries, sour|Area harvested`)) / (max(`Cherries, sour|Area harvested`) - min(`Cherries, sour|Area harvested`))) %>% 
  mutate(`Agriculture total|CO2` = (`Agriculture total|CO2` - min(`Agriculture total|CO2`)) / (max(`Agriculture total|CO2`) - min(`Agriculture total|CO2`))) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(
    x = as.numeric(Year)
  )) +
  geom_line(aes(
    y = `Cherries, sour|Area harvested`,
    color = "Sour Cherries"
  )) +
  geom_line(aes(
    y = `Agriculture total|CO2`,
    color = "Total Agriculture Emissions"
  )) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Sour Cherries" = "red", "Total Agriculture Emissions" = "black")) +
  labs(
    x = "Time (years)",
    y = "Normalized Metric",
    title = "Cherries Harvested vs Total Agriculture Emissions over Time (Normalized)"
  ) +
  theme(legend.position="bottom", legend.box = "horizontal")
```
